item.title: CSE Simplified EP5 - Overcoming FOMO
item.description: We have already released 4 episodes of CSE Simplified to help you understand what CSE is all about and how to approach it. Many more episodes are yet to come. We hope they will help you get the most out of your B.Tech. In this 5th episode, we want to talk about one of the most dangerous problem several students fall into. It’s the “FOMO - Fear Of Missing Out”. Our aim is to clear out some points so that you can happily go through the journey of becoming a successful person.

item.title: CSE Simplified EP4 - Choosing your laptop
item.description: Laptop plays a very crucial role in a CSE student’s life. Just after taking admission in the B.Tech CSE program, students are often in a hurry to buy a laptop. We have seen juniors making mistakes while buying a new laptop. They ask for help and people would just send a link for the sake of formality, without doing any research based on the requirements. Please beware of such things because you may regret such a decision in the near future.

item.title: The reality of CSE in Private colleges of India
item.description: Introduction The technical education system of CSE in private colleges is very bad. The colleges have opened just to run a business. They are not creating actual Computer Science Engineers. Majority of students end up getting placed in Service based jobs which stops their mental growth. These students do not get jobs CSE students deserve. Now this problem has been prevailing since a long time now. Situation may have changed a bit but leaving it as is and hoping for better tomorrow will take a lot of time.
